responses.question: hello
responses.answer: Hello! How can I assist you with your stationery needs today?

responses.question: hi
responses.answer: Hi there! Welcome to PinkStationery. How can I help you?

responses.question: how are you
responses.answer: I'm doing great, thank you! Ready to help you find the perfect stationery.

responses.question: what are your business hours
responses.answer: We're open Monday to Saturday from 9:00 AM to 8:00 PM.

responses.question: do you offer free shipping
responses.answer: Yes! We offer free shipping on all orders above â‚¹499.

responses.question: what payment methods do you accept
responses.answer: We accept credit/debit cards, UPI, net banking, and cash on delivery.

responses.question: can i return a product
responses.answer: Yes, we have a 7-day return policy for unused products in original packaging.

responses.question: where is your store located
responses.answer: Our main store is at 123 Stationery Street, Pink City. You can also shop online!

responses.question: do you have notebooks
responses.answer: Yes! We have a wide variety of notebooks in different sizes and designs.

responses.question: what types of pens do you sell
responses.answer: We sell ballpoint pens, gel pens, fountain pens, and highlighters.

responses.question: do you have art supplies
responses.answer: Absolutely! We have color pencils, sketchbooks, watercolors, and more.

responses.question: how can i track my order
responses.answer: You can track your order from the "My Orders" section with your order ID.

responses.question: do you have gift items
responses.answer: Yes, we have gift sets, decorative stationery, and personalized items.

responses.question: what is your phone number
responses.answer: You can reach us at +91-9876543210 during business hours.

responses.question: do you have backpacks
responses.answer: Yes, we have school bags, laptop bags, and backpacks in various designs.

responses.question: are your products eco-friendly
responses.answer: We have a range of eco-friendly products made from recycled materials.

responses.question: do you offer discounts
responses.answer: We have regular sales and discounts. Subscribe to our newsletter for updates!

responses.question: how long does delivery take
responses.answer: Delivery usually takes 3-5 business days depending on your location.

responses.question: can i cancel my order
responses.answer: You can cancel your order within 24 hours of placing it.

responses.question: do you have sticky notes
responses.answer: Yes, we have sticky notes in various colors, shapes and sizes.

responses.question: what brands do you carry
responses.answer: We carry popular brands like Classmate, Parker, Camlin, and many more.

responses.question: do you have planners
responses.answer: Yes, we have daily, weekly, and monthly planners in different styles.

responses.question: can i order in bulk
responses.answer: Yes, we offer special discounts for bulk orders. Contact us for details.

responses.question: do you have markers
responses.answer: We have permanent markers, whiteboard markers, and highlighters.

responses.question: what is your bestseller
responses.answer: Our gel pen sets and decorative notebooks are customer favorites!

responses.question: thank you
responses.answer: You're welcome! Let me know if you need anything else.
